message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $90. How about we meet at $98?
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to buying from John, but I'm still interested in the product. How about we meet at $102?
I'm getting a bit worried about losing the deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $106, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?
I'm not going to meet you at $106, but I'm willing to go up to $103. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but that's as high as I can go. Can you reconsider?
I'm really close to buying from John, but I'll make one last offer. How about we meet at $102.50?
